name: .EDRW
summary: Learn about .EDRW files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open EDRW files in Dassault Systems eDrawings Viewer (Windows, Mac) or the mobile versions of eDrawings (iOS, Android). The desktop and mobile applications include tools that allow users to switch between drawing views and examine drawings in depth. eDrawings Viewer allows users to print drawings and export them in other file formats.
eDrawings Viewer is also packaged with Dassault Systemes SolidWorks.
eDrawings Viewer can convert EDRW to the following formats:

images.alt: Screenshot of a .edrw file in Dassault Systemes SolidWorks eDrawings Viewer
images.caption: EDRW file open in Dassault Systemes SolidWorks eDrawings Viewer
